EmailTemplate.description: Notified Users has changed to Primary Reviewer Email
EmailTemplate.name: Notified Users has changed to Primary Reviewer Email
EmailTemplate.subject: ACTION REQUIRED: FPR {!PubReviewTeam__c.Publication__c} Has Been Assigned for Your Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Do not reply to this email message.
FPR {!PubReviewTeam__c.PubIDLink__c} has been assigned for your review by {!PubReviewTeam__c.FPRDueDateFF__c}.
It is your responsibility to uphold this assignment. If you are unavailable to review and cannot meet this deadline contact the FPR coordinator, {!PubReviewTeam__c.AssignedFPRCFF__c}, to arrange a delegate in your place. Thank you in advance for your review.
{!PubReviewTeam__c.PubIDLink__c}
Note: If additional reviewers are needed, triage this assignment BEFORE voting. All new reviewers must be trained on the FPR system.
Thank you, FPR System
